mapper.sql: id, nurse_id, nurse_type, older_id, older_name, nurse_time, health_condition, nurse_medicine, nurser_id, nurser_name, execute_flag, execute_time, evaluation, cleared, note
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pension_daycare
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into pension_daycare (id, nurse_id, nurse_type, older_id, older_name, nurse_time, health_condition, nurse_medicine, nurser_id, nurser_name, execute_flag, execute_time, evaluation, cleared, note ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nurseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nurseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{olderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{olderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nurseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{healthCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nurseMedicine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nurserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nurserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executeFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{evaluation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

id,
nurse_id,

nurse_time,
health_condition,

nurser_id,

note,

mapper.update:
update pension_daycare
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nurse_id = #{record.nurseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nurse_type = #{record.nurseType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
older_id = #{record.olderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
older_name = #{record.olderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nurse_time = #{record.nurseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
health_condition = #{record.healthCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nurse_medicine = #{record.nurseMedicine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nurser_id = #{record.nurserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nurser_name = #{record.nurserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
execute_flag = #{record.executeFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
execute_time = #{record.executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
evaluation = #{record.evaluation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cleared = #{record.cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update pension_daycare set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nurse_id = #{record.nurseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nurse_type = #{record.nurseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, older_id = #{record.olderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, older_name = #{record.olderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nurse_time = #{record.nurseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, health_condition = #{record.healthCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nurse_medicine = #{record.nurseMedicine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nurser_id = #{record.nurserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nurser_name = #{record.nurserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, execute_flag = #{record.executeFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, execute_time = #{record.executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, evaluation = #{record.evaluation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cleared = #{record.cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{record.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update pension_daycare
nurse_id = #{nurseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nurse_type = #{nurseType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
older_id = #{olderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
older_name = #{olderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nurse_time = #{nurseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
health_condition = #{healthCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nurse_medicine = #{nurseMedicine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nurser_id = #{nurserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nurser_name = #{nurserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
execute_flag = #{executeFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
execute_time = #{executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
evaluation = #{evaluation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cleared = #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update pension_daycare set nurse_id = #{nurseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nurse_type = #{nurseType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, older_id = #{olderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, older_name = #{olderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nurse_time = #{nurseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, health_condition = #{healthCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nurse_medicine = #{nurseMedicine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nurser_id = #{nurserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nurser_name = #{nurserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, execute_flag = #{executeFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, execute_time = #{executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, evaluation = #{evaluation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cleared = #{cleared,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select pd.id, pd.nurse_type as nurseType, pd.older_name as olderName, pd.nurse_time as nurseTime, pd.health_condition as healthCondition, pd.nurse_medicine as nurseMedicine, pd.nurser_name as nurserName, if(pd.execute_flag=1,true,false) as excuteF, pd.execute_time as executeTime, pd.evaluation from pension_daycare pd where pd.cleared=2 and pd.nurse_type=1
and pd.nurse_id=#{planId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select pd.id, pd.nurse_type as nurseType, pd.nurse_id as nurseId, pd.older_name as olderName, pd.nurse_time as nurseTime, pd.health_condition as healthCondition, pd.nurse_medicine as nurseMedicine, pd.nurser_name as nurserName, if(pd.execute_flag=1,true,false) as excuteF, pd.execute_time as executeTime, pd.evaluation, pd.older_id as olderId, pd.nurser_id as nurserId from pension_daycare pd where pd.cleared=2 and pd.execute_flag=2 and unix_timestamp(pd.nurse_time) >=unix_timestamp(#{checkDate}) and unix_timestamp(pd.nurse_time) <unix_timestamp(date_add(#{checkDate}, interval 1 day))
